item.description:
Explore the heart of Shin Buddhism, also known as Jodo Shinshu, through a contemporary reading of the Shoshinge. Learn about Buddhist practice, daily life and the reality of the great compassion that ceaselessly envelopes our lives. The Shoshinge is one of the most important Pure Land writings, written by the founder and foremost teacher of this tradition, Shinran Shonin. Lead by Senpai

 

p.s. REMINDER - Hosted by the Buddhist Faith Fellowship. Even though just one or two people from Meetup have RSVPed, you can expect 35 - 45 people in attendance.
